query.statement:
SELECT A.MENU_DATE, (E.CODE_NAME || F.CODE_NAME || DECODE(G.CORNER_DESC, NULL, '', '[' || G.CORNER_DESC || ']')) AS MENU_DESC, SUM(ROUND((D.CAL * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) CAL, -- "열량" SUM(ROUND((D.CARBO * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) CARBO, --"당질" SUM(ROUND((D.PROT * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) PROT, --"단백질" SUM(ROUND((D.FAT * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) FAT, --"지질" SUM(ROUND((D.VITA_A * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) VITA_A, --"비타민A" SUM(ROUND((D.THIA * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) THIA, --"비타민B1" SUM(ROUND((D.RIBO * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) RIBO, --"비타민B2" SUM(ROUND((D.VITA_C * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) VITA_C, --"비타민C" SUM(ROUND((D.CA * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) CA, --"칼슘" SUM(ROUND((D.FE * C.EDIBLE_QTY / 100),2)) FE --"철" FROM FSM_REAL_MENU_MST A, -- 실재 식단 마스터(KEY : UPJANG, MENU_CD) FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST B, -- 실재 레시피 마스터(KEY : UPJANG, MENU_CD, RECIPE_CD) FSM_REAL_RECIPE_ITEM C, -- 실재 레시피 품목(KEY : UPJANG, MENU_CD, RECIPE_CD, ITEM_CODE) FSI_ITEM_NUT D, (SELECT CODE, CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0023') E, (SELECT CODE, CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0022') F, FSA_HALL_DTL G WHERE A.UPJANG = #UPJANG# -- "업장코드(필수조회조건)" AND A.HALL_CD = #HALL_CD# -- "식당코드(필수조회조건)" AND A.MENU_DATE BETWEEN #FROM_MENU_DATE# AND #TO_MENU_DATE# -- "제공일자(검색조건)"
AND A.MEAL = #MEAL# -- "끼니코드(검색조건)"
AND A.CORNER = #CORNER# --"코너코드(검색조건)"
AND A.UPJANG = B.UPJANG AND A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD AND B.UPJANG = C.UPJANG AND B.MENU_CD = C.MENU_CD AND B.RECIPE_CD = C.RECIPE_CD AND C.ITEM_CODE = D.ITEM_CODE AND A.MEAL = E.CODE(+) AND A.CORNER = F.CODE(+) AND A.UPJANG = G.UPJANG AND A.HALL_CD = G.HALL_CD AND A.MEAL = G.MEAL AND A.CORNER = G.CORNER GROUP BY A.MENU_DATE, A.MENU_CD, E.CODE_NAME, F.CODE_NAME, G.CORNER_DESC
